product_name: prAna Belize Printed Natural Yoga Mat
long_description: Made with natural, biodegradable, non-Amazon tree rubber, this superthin travel yoga mat delivers exceptional floor feel and a design that's easy to clean and fits easily in a suitcase or travel bag.
